p.d: He 2020 World Marathon Challenge began on the continent of Africa, on February 6th. The Africa Intercontinental Marathon commenced on the scenic Seapoint Promenade. Unlike other years, the Antarctica Intercontinental Marathon was the second rather than first of the seven marathons this year. Perth, Dubai, Madrid, Fortaleza and a finish in Miami followed this as unique as described World Marathon Challenge. Seven continents in seven days â€“ and the Challenge has completed successfully!
